name: Ampharos
flavorText:
The tail's tip
shines brightly
and can be seen from far away. It
acts as a beacon
for lost people.

previous.name: Flaaffy
previous.flavorText:
As a result of
storing too much
electricity, it developed patches
where even downy
wool won't grow.

next.name: Bellossom
next.flavorText:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it
dances, its petals rub together and
make a pleasant ringing sound.

pokemon.name: Mareep
pokemon.flavorText:
If static elec­
tricity builds in
its body, its fleece doubles in
volume. Touching
it will shock you.

where even downy
wool won't grow.
